title: Constant Elasticity of Substitution (CES) for Marshallian and Hicksian Demand Functions

author.name: Marshallian consumption 2 (red curve and red line): maximization of U(X,Y) with optimal consumption X^*F, Y^*F subject to uncompensated income M=P_X, new X+P_Y, new Y, where P_X, new and P_Y, new are the changed prices.
